Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32149 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-32149 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-17, affected by CVE-2022-32149
